statements: DELETE FROM customer_notifications WHERE customer_id = 100 AND order_id = 200;
DELETE FROM customer_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Promotion' AND notification_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 AND order_status = 'Shipped';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE sent_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
DELETE FROM Notifications WHERE customer_id = 200 AND notification_type = 'Special'
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 2005 AND quantity > 10;
